titles.title: God Leads Us Along (G. A. Young)

v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God leads His dear children along. Some thru the waters, some thru the flood, some thru the fire, but all thru the blood; Some thru great sorrow, but God gives a song, In the night season, and all the day long.{/lang-eng}
